class.name: GodotcordStoreManager
class.brief_description: A wrapper of the Discord Game SDK Store Manager.
class.description: A wrapper of the Discord Game SDK Store Manager.

method.name: fetch_entitlements
method.description: Refetches the entitlements of the local user

method.name: fetch_entitlements
method.description: Returns the entitlements of the local user.

method.name: fetch_entitlements
method.description: Returns whether the local user has an entitlement for the sku [code]sku_id[/code].

method.name: start_purchase
method.description: Opens the discord client and starts a purchase dialog for the sku [code]sku_id[/code].
